scripts.pretest: (if exist allure-results rmdir /s /q allure-results) && (if exist allure-report rmdir /s /q allure-report) && (if exist cypress\videos rmdir /s /q cypress\videos) && (if exist cypress\screenshots rmdir /s /q cypress\screenshots) && (mkdir allure-results)
scripts.cy:open: npx cypress open --env allure=true --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/examples/** --browser chrome
scripts.cy:run: DEBUG=allure-plugin* npx cypress run --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/examples/* --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.cy:cucumber:run: DEBUG=allure-plugin* npx cypress run --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/cucumber/*.feature,excludeSpecPattern=*.js --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.allure:history: mv -f allure-report/history allure-results/history && rm -r allure-report || true
scripts.posttest: allure generate allure-results -c -o allure-report && allure open allure-report

devDependencies._comment: the version has been: cypress-12.14.0, otherwise cannot generate an allure report
